highlights: Working closely with the design team, I helped develop engaging web experiences and integrated digital marketing tools to promote the Cat NFT project.
Worked on Cat Azure, a student project created alongside a team of six, contributing mainly to the frontend and API development of the application and hosting the database on a cloud platform.
I worked on a solution to build and customize web forms using a schema-based approach, including a standard for exchanging electronic health records (FHIR).
Mobile app domain lead responsible for deep links, biometrics, push notifications, navigation, CI/CD, and release management for a React Native superapp.
Developed features and caching strategies for a React payments app. Domain lead responsible for automated testing and code health.

keywords: React, React Native, Next.js, Expo, Node.js

projects.description: Created a headless e-commerce store with Next.js and Sanity. Created scripts to deploy the build and deploy the app to Vercel.
